alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Northampton; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 21 at 2:29PM EST until January 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Ice accumulations of a light glaze possible late this afternoon across northeast North Carolina before precipitation changes to snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of eastern and southeast Virginia and northeast North Carolina. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.

area.areaDesc: Chesapeake; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Northampton; Virginia Beach
